name: DocExchange
overview: DocExchange, Inc., doing business as SpringCM, provides enterprise content management solutions through Web-based software-as-a-service model. Its enterprise content management cloud platform enables business analysts and line-of-business managers to build and deploy document management and workflow applications. The company also provides Sales Contract Management solution that enables sales reps and executive management to have deeper visibility into sales contract lifecycles ranging from creation, revision, compliance, and signatures to contract renewals; and Invoice Automation solution that automates the workflow process ranging from capture of invoice information to matching, purchase order specifications, approval and sign-off process, and electronic submission for payment to an enterprise resource planning system. DocExchange, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in San Mateo, California.
